mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPAYINFO(REPAYID, REPAYTYPE, SUPPORTMONEY, REPAYCONTENT, SHOWPHOTO, REPAYNUM, LIMITEDBUY, CARRIAGE, INVOICE, REPAYDAY, PROJECTID) VALUES (SEQ_PK_REPAYINFO.NEXTVAL, #{repayType}, #{supportMoney}, #{repayContent}, #{showPhoto}, #{repayNum}, #{limitedBuy}, #{carriage}, #{invoice}, #{repayDay}, #{projectId})
